MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 5:53PM in the LL66 and LL68  postcode areas of Rhosgoch and Amlwch following reports of a low overhead electrical line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:57PM on 21st February 2021.
